summary: Frontend testing for cache-first performance refactoring on 4 pages: business/[slug].tsx, credits/index.tsx, boost/[listing_id].tsx, performance/[listing_id].tsx. FIXED: 4 bugs - missing ActivityIndicator imports in 3 files, undefined loadData function reference in performance page. All pages load instantly without page-level spinners.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed 3 files with missing ActivityIndicator import from react-native: business/[slug].tsx, credits/index.tsx, boost/[listing_id].tsx
Fixed performance/[listing_id].tsx: loadData was referenced but not defined - changed to onRefresh function
Added RefreshControl to credits/index.tsx mobile ScrollView for pull-to-refresh functionality
Cache-first pattern correctly implemented using useCacheFirst hook - pages render instantly with cached or fallback data
localStorage quota error observed for @cache_home_listings - not blocking but worth monitoring

bug_fixes.issue: ActivityIndicator used on line 567-570 (Load More button loading state) but not imported from react-native
ActivityIndicator used on line 495 (purchasing button loading state) but not imported from react-native
ActivityIndicator used on line 355 (boost button loading state) but not imported from react-native
Undefined loadData function referenced on line 296 (Retry button onPress handler)
bug_fixes.fix: Changed loadData to onRefresh which is the correct function defined in the component

bug_fixes.issue: Mobile ScrollView missing RefreshControl for pull-to-refresh
bug_fixes.fix: Added RefreshControl with refreshing state and handleRefresh function

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 186 verified cache-first pattern for 4 pages: /business/[slug], /credits, /boost/[listing_id], /performance/[listing_id]. Fixed 5 bugs - 3 missing ActivityIndicator imports, 1 undefined function reference (loadData -> onRefresh), and 1 missing RefreshControl in mobile view. All pages load instantly without full-page spinners. This is part of the 'Zero Loaders' performance refactoring initiative.
